TO_MANY_REQUEST:
You're on cooldown!
Too many requests. Try again later.
UNAUTHORIZED:
Error
Please relogin by refreshing this page
USER_IS_ANON: Cannot add Guest Account as a friend
I_AM_ANON: Cannot add friends using Guest Account
AUTH_ANON_CONFIRM:
If you use a Guest Account, you won't be able to make friends with other people. Also, your account will be deleted after 24 hours.
How about it? Still want to continue?
AUTH_VERIFICATION_OTP:
We have sent you an email for your 6-digit verification code.
Check the spam folder if it does not appear in your inbox
AUTH_RATE_LIMIT: You have reached the login request limit. Please try again later.
AUTH_ERR_02: Your email address is not valid
AUTH_ERR_04: The code you sent doesn't match any account
AUTH_ERR_05:
The code you sent has expired.
Please generate new code by relogin.
AUTH_TOO_MANY_ANONS:
Sorry mate, too many guest accounts have been registered today.
Please try logging in with another method. Or you can wait until some guest accounts expire.
AUTH_NOTICE: By registering, you agree and accept the Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy
ACC_USERNAME_NOT_VALID: Username may only contain letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), and underscores (_)
ACC_USERNAME_LIMIT: Username must contain at least 5 characters with a maximum of 20 characters
ACC_SKIN_NOT_VALID: Some of the skins you choose are invalid
ACC_NO_NAME_CARD_TICKET: Name Card is not valid or has expired

CHAR_NO_APPR_CARD_TICKET: Clothing Card is not valid or has expired

FR_MAX: Please enter a maximum of 20 characters
JOB_DISBANDED: job has been aborted and the team has been disbanded
TM_NOT_PUBLIC_ANYMORE: The job with this Team Code has been set to be non-public

MM_NOTIP_HOST_FUNC: Invitation Type can only be changed by Host
MM_NOTIP_HOST_INV: Host has restricted the invitations for the team members friend list
